cab.content: Military Secret.720 From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India, 1st April 1918. (Received 2nd, 11 a.m.) 1136. Marri situation. Punitive measures continue against Marris.Bad weather has interfered with movement. On 29th March Ivahan wassuccessfully bombed. On 31st March Babar Kach column raided Quatcapturing prisoners and cattle. Unconfirmed report states Marris are(? concentrating) for attack on Vitakri.
